plot outline: The family drama starts with Jayanthan Menon's assistant Kaimal meets Chitra (Jayanthan's wife) conveying his wish to meet his daughter Manasa before he dies. However Chitra and Manasa convey their hatred towards him. She sends her friend Krishnendhu to Jayanthan Menon as Manasa. But a turn of events puts all three under the same roof.
title: Kana Kanmani
plot: The family drama starts with Jayanthan Menon's assistant Kaimal meets Chitra (Jayanthan's wife) conveying his wish to meet his daughter Manasa before he dies. However Chitra and Manasa convey their hatred towards him. She sends her friend Krishnendhu to Jayanthan Menon as Manasa. But a turn of events puts all three under the same roof.
